Constructor Detail

DBConvertMySQLToDerbyDatabase

public DBConvertMySQLToDerbyDatabase(DBAdminDatabase admin,
                                     java.lang.String sDatabaseUserName,
                                     java.lang.String sDatabasePassword,
                                     java.lang.String sDatabaseIP)
Constructor, creates an empty Vector to hold the DBProgressListeners which may be registered. This constructor also takes a name and password to use when accessing the database, and the IP address of the server machine.

Parameters:
admin, - a reference to the DBAdminDatabase object to use to register the new database.
sDatabaseUserName, - the name to use when creating the connection to the database, or null if not required.
sDatabasePassword, - the password to use when connection to the database, or null if not required.
sDatabaseIP, - the IP address of the server machine. Or null, if not required. The default if 'localhost'.
Method Detail

copyDatabase

public void copyDatabase(java.lang.String sFromName,
                         java.lang.String sFriendlyToName,
                         java.lang.String sFriendlyFromName)
                  throws java.lang.ClassNotFoundException,
                         java.sql.SQLException,
                         DBDatabaseNameException,
                         DBDatabaseTypeException,
                         DBDatabaseTypeException
Convert the given MySQL database to Derby.

Specified by:
copyDatabase in class DBCopyData
Parameters:
String - sFromName, the name of the database to convert.
String - sFriendlyToName, the name of the database to create to convert the data into.
String - sFriendlyFromName, the user known name of the database to convert the data from.
Throws:
java.lang.ClassNotFoundException
java.sql.SQLException
DBDatabaseNameException, - thrown if a database with the name given in the constructor already exists.
DBDatabaseTypeException, - thrown if a database connection of the specific type cannot be created.
DBDatabaseNameException
DBDatabaseTypeException
